title: MHA OCs
body:
Anyone wanna talk about em? I’m thinking of writing a fanfic and would love to share ideas and/or collab with someone. I just think it would be fun. And if you don’t wanna write FF, I’d still love to just talk about My Hero with more people. I only know like, 3 people that have watched it lol 

Please, I need friends

♥Personal Information♥
» Name: Ellis
» Age: 16
» Star Sign: Pisces
» Birthday: February 19th

♥Blog Information♥
» Requests: Open!
» Commissions: Open!
» Contact: Feel free to message me anytime on Tumblr or on Discord. My username is Ellison#4846!
» Art: I draw mostly traditional art, and am highly interested in Splatoon, Moomin, the Legend of Zelda series, and anime such as Banana Fish, My Hero Academia and Inuyasha.
» Warnings: Do not re-upload my art please! Sharing to Discord with credit is totally fine!

FAQ Rules

summary: Can i ask more fluff for Sero? 🙏💕
question: Can i ask more fluff for Sero? 🙏💕
answer:
Thank you for sending a request ❤️

UA high school decided to redo their training camp at a more suitable time, and that time had finally come.

You had been working your way through two tough days of training already when it was finally time for something fun, the scare walk.

You anxiously looked at your classmates as they paired up, you had someone in mind but were too shy to ask him.

You had a crush on Sero and none of the people that you had told really understood why. They called him plain but to you something about him had always stood out.

From next to you you see Sero walking up to you and your heart skips a beat.

“Would you like to go together Y/N?” He asks you and even in the dark forest you can see the blush on his face. You nod your head and smile at him.

The teachers give the sign to go and you and Sero start your walk through the forest.

At first you both stay silent. The complete silence around you makes you think he could hear your heart beating fast.

You almost jump out of your skin as you hear a sudden scream. The first scare has shown itself, a classmate with a floating quirk is masquerading as a ghost. Your body feels shaky and your face heats up from embarrassment. You aren’t even scared of these kinds of things, but your body is so tensed up that it couldn’t be helped. Sero wraps an arm around you and pulls you close to him. “It’s alright Y/N, it’s all fake.” You laugh nervously and he notices the real reason why you are acting this way. He had heard whispers from his classmates about it, and he hoped it was true but never knew for sure. That’s why he had asked you to go with him in the first place.

“If it was real, I could totally take them on though. They would be running away screaming after they see me in action.” Sero says, trying to break the tension. You genuinely laugh at that and allow yourself to open up to him, enjoying the warmth the side of his chest gives you. Sero wraps his arm around your waist while you keep walking and you can’t deny that you feel so happy.

“Sero?” You ask and he humms in response. “Do you have a crush on someone?”

Sero slows his pace as you ask him this. “Uh yeah… I do.”

You chicken out. “I see.”

Sero looks at you but you don’t return his gaze, feeling too embarrassed.

Why can’t you just tell him how you feel?!

“Hey Y/N, I have an idea.” Sero says with a wide smile. You look at him now, frowning as you wonder what it is.

His grip on you tightness and Sero shoots out his tape, wrapping it around a thick tree branch. You yelp as he pulls you up on the tree with him.

You clumsily cling onto Sero and he helps you get your balance on the branch.

“What are you doing?!” You ask and he chuckles.

“I thought it would be fun if we do some scaring. Your quirk is multiplication isn’t it?” Sero says and you nod in response, still not understanding where he’s going with this.

He pulls a tiny creepy looking doll out of his pocket. “I picked it up earlier. I thought you could make some more of them and we could swing them past people with my tape.” He explains proudly.

You stare at him for a second before laughing. It’s so silly but you love it.

“That’s a great idea Sero!” You tell him and he looks glad that you like it.


You and Sero execute his plan and get some amazing laughs. It doesn’t work on everyone but the fair share of people run off scared at the dolls flying past them.

You turn to Sero, both of you smiling widely.

He leans forward and gently kisses you. You freeze at first but then kiss him back. The kiss is broken and you look each other in the eye, no longer needing words to express how you feel.

Soon after this you two stop scaring the others and instead finish the walk, returning to the camp hand in hand.

tags: I got to put the first one on the tag
title: Encounter Behind The Dorms (Bnha fanfic)
body:
Sumary:  Ojiro “regular guy” Mashirao was making out with basically a hot stranger instead of going with his classmates to see the rest of the exercise. Take that, everyone who deemed him a normal, boring guy. He was normal, but now he was also getting some.

Pair: Kaibara Sen/Ojiro Mashirao

Link
